description: Schema for storing the context data required to render a message in Adobe Journey Optimizer

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Map containing identifiers for the profile across different identity namespaces

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Rendering Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: A map of namespace identifiers to stringified JSON representations of context objects used in template rendering and personalization

profile.title: Profile Context
profile.description: Stringified JSON of profile attributes accessed via the 'profile' namespace in templates

offer.title: Offer Context
offer.description: Stringified JSON of offer decision information accessed via the 'offer' namespace in templates

context.title: Context
context.description: Stringified JSON of context variables for general purpose use

propertiesContext.title: Properties Context
propertiesContext.description: Stringified JSON of Journey Optimizer properties and configuration settings for the message

decisionPolicy.title: Decision Policy Context
decisionPolicy.description: Stringified JSON of decision policy information for offer decisioning

offerContentAttributes.title: Offer Content Attributes
offerContentAttributes.description: Stringified JSON of attributes related to offer content

url.title: URL Context
url.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

fragment.title: Fragment Context
fragment.description: Stringified JSON of content fragments that can be inserted into templates

externalDataLookup.title: External Data Lookup
externalDataLookup.description: Stringified JSON of context for external data lookups during rendering

url-support.title: URL Support
url-support.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

inputSchema.title: Input Schema
inputSchema.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

channelConfiguration.title: Channel Configuration
channelConfiguration.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

segment.title: Segment Context
segment.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

_cjmProperties.title: CJM Properties
_cjmProperties.description: Stringified JSON of internal properties used by the CJM rendering engine
